item.title: 美国国债价格跳涨，因通胀放缓支撑市场押注美联储六月降息
item.description: 美国国债价格大幅上涨，因低于预期的消费者价格指数数据强化了美联储今年晚些时候降息的预期。【原文：Treasuries jumped after a weaker-than-expected consumer price gauge bolstered the case for the Federal Reserve to lower interest rates later this year.】

item.title: 德意志银行称欧洲防务股估值逼近峰值
item.description: 德意志银行分析师警告称，欧洲防务类股估值可能正逼近峰值。该行业今年已飙升逾20%，而德银分析师是少数唱衰该板块的声音之一。【原文：European defense stocks might be approaching a peak in their valuations, warn Deustche Bank AG analysts, who are among the few contrarian voices on a sector that has already surged more than 20% this year.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚在选举年临近之际加速出售美元债务
item.description: 哥伦比亚今年首次向全球债券市场融资，当局正争分夺秒满足该国资金需求，以应对即将到来的国会和总统选举。【原文：Colombia is tapping global bond markets for the first time this year, as authorities rush to cover the nation’s funding needs ahead of congressional and presidential elections.】

item.title: 美国核心CPI环比上涨0.2%，扭转了市场预期中的大幅反弹态势
item.description: 美国12月核心通胀涨幅低于预期，这表明物价增长放缓的迹象更为明确——此前因政府停摆造成的数据扭曲曾使前次报告结果复杂化。【原文：Underlying US inflation rose in December by less than expected, a more confident signal of cooling price growth after shutdown-related distortions complicated the previous report.】

item.title: 台湾针对一加公司首席执行官发出逮捕令，涉及其在中国雇佣员工事宜
item.description: 台湾检方对华硕旗下智能手机品牌一加的首席执行官签发逮捕令，此举标志着台湾地区正加大力度阻止中国科技企业招揽台湾人才。【原文：Prosecutors in Taiwan issued an arrest warrant for the chief executive officer of the Chinese smartphone company OnePlus, stepping up the island’s efforts to block China’s tech players from recruiting Taiwanese talent.】

item.title: 瑞士拟取消仅靠单一收入维持生计的已婚夫妇的税收优惠
item.description: 瑞士政府支持一项提案，拟取消仅有一方工作的已婚夫妇的税收优惠政策，这项影响深远的改革方案将于三月提交全民公投。【原文：The Swiss government is backing a proposal to abolish preferential tax treatment for married couples with only one earner, endorsing a far-reaching reform that will go before voters in March.】

item.title: 捷克央行认为核心通胀是保持谨慎的重要理由
item.description: 捷克央行表示，尽管今年整体通胀率可能低于目标水平，但衡量该国潜在价格压力的关键指标仍居高不下，需要采取紧缩的货币政策。【原文：A key gauge of underlying price pressures in the Czech Republic remains elevated and requires tight monetary policy, even as headline inflation may undershoot the target this year, according to the central bank.】

item.title: 华尔街抛售38亿美元黄金市场复杂押注组合
item.description: 与标普500指数中一个小众指数相关的交易激增，揭示了华尔街正在酝酿一项更深层次的押注：利率将走低的赌注。【原文：A flurry of trades tied to a niche S&P 500 index is revealing a deeper wager coursing through Wall Street: a bet that interest rates are headed lower.】

item.title: 美国银行集团以10亿美元收购经纪商BTIG，加速拓展交易业务
item.description: 美国银行集团（US Bancorp）将以10亿美元收购经纪公司BTIG，这家美国最大的地区性银行正寻求进一步拓展投资银行和交易业务。【原文：US Bancorp, the country’s largest regional bank, will acquire brokerage BTIG for $1 billion as it looks to push deeper into investment banking and trading.】

item.title: 极讯网络考虑收购康普旗下的Ruckus
item.description: 据知情人士透露，极讯网络公司正考虑从康普控股公司收购鲁卡斯网络公司。【原文：Extreme Networks Inc. is exploring an acquisition of Ruckus Networks from CommScope Holding Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Meta开始裁员，从元宇宙转向人工智能设备
item.description: Meta Platforms公司正着手裁撤旗下Reality Labs部门逾1000个岗位，此举旨在将资源从虚拟现实和元宇宙产品转向人工智能可穿戴设备及手机功能领域。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is beginning to cut more than 1,000 jobs from the company’s Reality Labs division, part of a plan to redirect resources from virtual reality and metaverse products toward AI wearables and phone features.】

item.title: 香港最直言不讳的激进投资者戴维·韦伯去世，享年60岁
item.description: 香港最具影响力的激进投资者戴维·韦伯去世，享年60岁。他因调查企业不当行为引发监管机构调查，成为香港金融界名人。【原文：David Webb, Hong Kong’s most vocal activist investor whose investigations into corporate malfeasance triggered regulatory probes and made him a celebrity in the city’s financial industry, has died. He was 60.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气与电力对冲基金即将获利
item.description: 转向全天候交易或许能在利润衰退之际，为投资者提供再度获利的机会。【原文：A shift to round-the-clock trading could offer a chance to make money again just as profits ebb.】

item.title: 花旗称欧洲央行独立性亦面临风险
item.description: 花旗集团表示，未来几年欧洲央行独立性可能面临威胁，因为当前推动发行短期债券的趋势可能会诱使政客们要求降低利率。【原文：Central bank independence could come under threat in Europe over the coming years, should an ongoing move toward issuing shorter-dated bonds tempt politicians to push for lower interest rates, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 乌克兰企业面临30亿美元债务墙，罢工活动加剧
item.description: 随着今年约30亿美元债券到期，以及俄罗斯对该国基础设施的袭击不断加剧，乌克兰主要企业借款人正越来越多地寻求推迟支付利息和延长偿债期限来管理其债务负担。【原文：With around $3 billion of bonds coming due this year and Russian strikes on the nation’s infrastructure intensifying, Ukraine’s major corporate borrowers are increasingly looking to coupon delays and extensions to manage their debt loads.】

item.title: 人工智能波动性令追逐下一波赢家浪潮的股票交易员心神不宁
item.description: 过去一年，人工智能基础设施一直是股市的稳健投资标的，标普500指数中2025年表现最佳的许多公司都属于这一类别。但随着部分被视为赢家者开始遭受冲击，该板块正变得波动加剧。【原文：Artificial intelligence infrastructure has been a solid stock market bet over the past year, with many of 2025’s best performers in the S&P 500 Index falling into the category. But the trade is getting volatile as some of the perceived winners start taking hits.】

item.title: 美国国债小幅走低，交易员静候CPI通胀数据
item.description: 周二美国国债价格下跌，交易员们正密切关注12月通胀数据，以判断美联储今年可能何时重启降息步伐。【原文：US Treasuries slipped Tuesday as traders looked to December’s inflation data for clues on how quickly the Federal Reserve may resume lowering borrowing costs this year.】

item.title: Proxima从DCVA和英伟达获得8000万美元融资用于人工智能药物研发
item.description: 生物技术初创企业Proxima利用人工智能设计控制蛋白质相互作用的药物，已完成8000万美元种子轮融资。这笔资金将助力该公司收集更优质的数据，并最终开发出潜在候选药物。【原文：Proxima, a biotech startup using artificial intelligence to design drugs that control protein interactions, raised $80 million in seed funding, which will help it collect better data and eventually develop potential drug candidates.】

item.title: 特朗普政策的经济代价即将显现
item.description:
主流经济学家低估了本届政府引发的种种混乱所造成的代价，尤其是在贸易和移民政策方面。【原文：

Mainstream economists have underestimated the cost of all the confusion the administration has unleashed, particularly on trade and immigration.

item.title: 尽管放宽了交易规则，米莱仍力挺阿根廷比索
item.description: 即便在放松阿根廷对本国货币的严格管控后，总统哈维尔·米莱仍坚持核心策略：通过干预、管理和支撑比索汇率来抑制通胀。【原文：Even after easing Argentina’s tight grip on its currency, President Javier Milei is sticking with a core approach: Intervene, manage and prop up the peso, in an effort to keep inflation down.】

item.title: 英国另类网络公司G.Network在出售前进入破产管理程序
item.description: 英国宽带公司G.Network Communications已进入破产管理程序，其出售流程预计即将启动，这标志着该行业压力持续加剧。【原文：UK broadband firm G.Network Communications has been put into administration ahead of a sales process that is expected to kick off imminently, in the latest sign of mounting stress in the sector.】

item.title: 纽约联邦银行利润超出分析师预期，得益于手续费收入与利息收入增长
item.description: 纽约梅隆银行的利润超出分析师预期，主要得益于手续费收入和利息收入的增长。【原文：Bank of New York Mellon Corp.’s profit beat analysts’ estimates, driven by gains in fee revenue and interest income.】

item.title: 英国扩大票据市场的计划引发呼吁：应为零售业提供税收优惠
item.description: 零售交易平台表示，英国应考虑将政府债券的税收优惠政策扩展至票据市场，以提升其对私人投资者的吸引力。【原文：The UK should consider extending a tax perk for government bonds to the bills market to boost its attractiveness to private investors, according to retail trading platforms.】

item.title: 加拿大人支持禁售美国酒类，特朗普政府却犹豫不决，酿酒商受重创
item.description: 特朗普政府正向加拿大施压，要求其结束对美国酒精产品的抵制，该抵制行动正损害美国酿酒商的利益。多数加拿大人希望本国政府保持立场。【原文：The Trump administration is putting pressure on Canada to end a boycott of US-made alcohol that’s hurting distillers. Most Canadians want their governments to hold firm.】

item.title: 力拓聘请埃弗科的罗比和摩根大通参与收购嘉能可
item.description: 知情人士透露，力拓集团已聘请包括英国顶级业务开拓者西蒙·罗比在内的一批银行家，以推进对嘉能可公司的收购交易。【原文：Rio Tinto Group has brought on a slate of bankers including Simon Robey, one of the UK’s top rainmakers, as it pursues a deal for Glencore Plc, people with knowledge of the matter said.】
